JOIN.TITLE: Join The Zenith Team
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Launch aerospace innovation to new heights

SPONSORS.TITLE: Our Sponsors
SPONSORS.SUBTITLE: Thank you to our incredible sponsors for making this possible

CONTACT.INTRODUCTION: Zenith, the leading technical society in drones and aircraft at Polytechnique Montreal, believes that technical excellence and audacity build the future. Founded in 2024, our team pushes the boundaries of aerospace technologies – and we want you by our side to go even further.
CONTACT.BENEFIT-DESCRIPTION: Conception, prototyping, piloting… Here, each project is an opportunity to grow technically and leave your mark.
CONTACT.BENEFIT-TITLE2: A team that aims for the skies
CONTACT.BENEFIT-DESCRIPTION2: Collaboration, sharing of expertise and competitive spirit to excel in competitions and real projects.
CONTACT.BENEFIT-DESCRIPTION3: Access to cutting-edge tools (CAD, drones, workshops) and the freedom to innovate on autonomous systems, embedded AI, or aerodynamics.
CONTACT.RESEARCH-STUDENTS: We are looking for students that are:
CONTACT.MOTIVATED-1: Motivated to get out of their comfort zone
CONTACT.MOTIVATED-4: Passionate about drones, aerospace, or cutting-edge technologies
CONTACT.DISCIPLINE: No matter your program (mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, software engineering, or other) if you are eager for progress and impact, you have a place here.
CONTACT.CONTACT_US: Ready to take off with us ?
CONTACT.JOIN: Join a passionate team and contribute to the future of aerospace
